profile:
Astrobiologist and exobiology expert with over 15 years of applied research
experience in remote and hazardous environments. Proven leadership on
interstellar missions and deep-space expeditions, with extensive expertise in
extraterrestrial sample collection, biological risk assessment, and AI-driven
research methodologies. Skilled in bridging scientific insight with operational
mission strategy under extreme isolation and high-stakes conditions.

bullets.company: European Space Agency (ESA) \u2013 Titan Life Probe Mission
experience: Directed biological research on-site during a mission to Saturn\u2019s moon Titan supporting planetary exploration objectives.
Led collection and preservation of extraterrestrial organic compounds in extreme environments to facilitate biological and astrobiological studies.
Coordinated with engineering and operations teams to integrate scientific findings into navigational and mission decisions aligning with space exploration standards.
Conducted biological investigations relevant to planetary survey missions in remote, high-stakes environments.
Delivered mission reports emphasizing biological sample integrity, safety protocols, and scientific insights to interstellar regulatory bodies.
Led analysis of microbial extremophiles in simulated exoplanetary environments supporting space biotech research initiatives.
Developed AI-assisted data pipelines for autonomous biological sample classification in extraterrestrial sample collection missions.
Established biosafety protocols for extraterrestrial sample containment to minimize contamination risks during space exploration.
Contributed to feasibility assessments for exploratory space vessel missions focusing on astrobiological research.
Applied advanced data analysis techniques to biological research supporting interstellar survey protocols.
Conducted planetary analog studies in Earth\u2019s extreme deserts and deep-sea environments to support extraterrestrial biological research.
Published peer-reviewed papers on microbial survivability, influencing planetary exploration and planetary protection protocols.
Served as scientific liaison assisting mission planning for Mars and Europa exploration programs emphasizing biological risk assessment.
Applied field methodologies relevant to remote biological data collection and environmental sample preservation.
Supported space missions with expertise in biological hazard assessment and environmental hazard analysis for planetary environment studies.
